To create a competitive effect in the viewer, to give the "fake player" the opportunity to either win at the very last moment or lose, thereby making it clear that time and skill are important here.
Show team mechanics — clutch saves, epic boss fights with friends. Use player names, emotional VO (“Let’s go!”), chat bubbles, and emotes. End with: “Play with friends. Or make new ones.”
Strong hook, raises interest.
